attributes.action: Review MP allowances and bring them into line with the private sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's live in a privilidged world that allows them to award themselves over generous allowances for expenses. Bring MP's expenses in line with those enjoyed by the private sector. Demand receipts for everything.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
